post.author: Admin
post.title: Desserts for Marching Band Concert on November 5
post.description:
Hi Sophomore Band Families,
On Wednesday, November 5, we will be celebrating the end of a fabulous
post.content:
Hi Sophomore Band Families,

On Wednesday, November 5, we will be celebrating the end of a fabulous marching band season with the Marching Band Concert at 7PM. Refreshments will be served to all in attendance immediately following the concert in Cafeteria I.

We are asking all Sophomore Band Families to bring a store bought dessert with NO peanuts to this event. Please, do NOT send home baked desserts.

Please send your store bought dessert with your band student and have them drop it off in Cafeteria 1 before they go to practice. Please put your last name on the dessert. No dessert should be dropped off in the band room. Someone will be in Cafeteria 1 to take the dessert.

If you have any questions, please contact me at 440-864-6543.

Thank you for your support and enjoy the Marching Band Concert!

Regards,
Amanda Kost
Hospitality Chair
